answers.answer: Hi,Your symptoms could be due to peripheral neuropathy caused by B 12 deficiency, thyroid dysfunction or diabetes.This requires further evaluation. I would suggest you to see your GP about it and in the meantime take B complex supplements.Thanks

question: 4months ago I started having this numbing pain on my right hand (just the whole side tip of my pinky to the end of my wrist) a moth after that I got the same numbing pain on the side of my left foot(small to up to my ankle.)
title: if my symptoms could neurological
